preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 12.0 g of potassium carbonate (K). 
 2. Weigh out 48.0 g of oxygen source (O). 
 3. Weigh out 15.0 g of phosphorus pentoxide (P). 
 4. Weigh out 20.0 g of strontium carbonate (Sr). 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all materials thoroughly using a spatula or mechanical mixer until a uniform mixture is achieved.
